keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for ensuring that the increase in global temperature remains well below 2 degrees and that Britain fulfills its responsibilities to become carbon neutral.

issues.environment: Advocates for ensuring that the increase in global temperature remains well below 2 degrees and that Britain fulfills its responsibilities to become carbon neutral.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have just returned from Copenhagen... I wanted to report back to you.

images.caption: Picture of Emily Thornberry speaking at a podium at Copenhagen Climate Change Summit, December 2009.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet has a handwritten note: 'To Islington with love from Emily Thornberry MP'
